Subject: Warehouse maintenance—Friday 22:00–23:00 UTC

Quick note: analytics dashboards may lag during this window. We’ll post in #data when it’s all clear.

Subject: Car claims triage v2—shipping this week

This release targets faster first decisions and fewer manual reviews. Rollout notes and dashboards are in Notion.

Subject: All‑hands offsite—save the date

We’re holding a one‑day offsite next month. Agenda and logistics next week; please keep the day open.

Subject: Phishing simulation—starts Monday

You may receive a simulated phish. If something feels off, report via the Phish Alert button. We’ll share the learnings.

Subject: Payment‑failed playbook—update

We adjusted the retry window and the customer nudge text. The refreshed steps are in the Ops wiki.

Subject: Q2 results—heads‑up

Results post this afternoon. The shareholder letter will follow shortly after. We’ll share highlights on Slack.

Subject: VPN stability—follow‑up actions

A MacOS update caused tunnel drops for some users. Please update the client and reconnect once. Report repeats in #help‑it.

Subject: Quiet rooms—reminder

Quiet rooms are first‑come. Please release a room if you leave early. The full etiquette is on Notion.
